author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-811. rb: http_client_transport.rb: allow custom http headers
Allows setting of custom http headers in http_client_transport.rb

author: rhuijben
msg: Make sure we never leak the pending error stored in the session, even
when we error because we got a timeout.
(svn_ra_serf__replay_range): Clear pending error or return it, but
(finish_report): Clear pending error or return it, but never leave

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-814. java: Include a TServlet in the standard Thrift distribution
This patch adds a TServlet implementation of the HttpServlet interface to be used with various containers.

author: struberg
msg: OWB-433 add a config  to relax NoCheckedExceptions rule on lifecycle interceptors
